description:
Montreal, Feb. 10, 2014 - Jamie Klinger presents the economic vision behind the online community marketplace JoatU (as in "Jack of all trade unit") which is also a web application and a digital currency.

Useful links:
* JoatU: http://joatu.com/
* Jamie: http://jamieklinger.com/
* MP43: /redirect?q=http%3A%2F%2Fmontrealpython.org%2Ffr%2F2014%2F02%2Fmp43%2F&event=video_description&v=1uPYkOpk5No&redir_token=oJOV-jjiIZQxzFMZ1y6mpJ_sVXx8MTUwNzc1NDA5NEAxNTA3NjY3Njk0
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: JoatU — Community-driven Economics #MP43
